Sinesis stumbled back from the shot.....he laughs. "fool! your too
weak!.....you'll never defeat me!....." he laughs some more.....then his
eyes grow wide when he hears a mysterious whistle..... "you!...." Sinesis
said to some unknown bot....just then, a scorpion drops from the sky and
converts to robot mode..... "Sinister! my brother! i thought i killed you
back on Cybertron!...." Sinesis says...... "you are a threat.....i destroy
threats!..in the name of Hell Beast i will destroy all threats,
brother!...." he throws a bomb, but sinesis throws it back!...Sinister
throws it again and it blows them both over a mountain and into a
lake!...they fought and brawled all around!.....
----- Original Message -----
From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 06, 2000 8:30 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Carnage/ Dinobot
>
> * Carnage yelled as she was struck down by Tankorr's last shot, she looked
> up at the sky as she now laied on her back. It was a beautiful day.*
>
> *****************************************************************
>
> * Dinobot snarled as the pain increased suddenly but then snapped his head
> towards Sineses as the Predacon fired upon Tavatron.
> He was just about to lift his rifle towards the Predacon when the pain
> overtook him and he dropped it, the gun clattered upon the ground.
> Dinobot roared as he ignored the pain and moved in front of Tavatron and
> fired his optic laser at Sineses, but then he almost doubled over in pain
as
> it occurredd again.
> Now he was sure that something had been damaged inside of his body,
> something vital!
> Dinobot bowed his head but then looked up and fired at Sineses again, it
was
> not only a battle against an enemy but a battle against how long he could
> stand this damage of his.
> The charges intended for Tavatron hit him as he stood in front of him,
most
> hit his shoulders and chest but some hit the areas where the acid had
eaten
> away his armor and made it weak. All it took was a well placed shot and he
> would soon have an open chest cavity, his internals would then be
> vulnerable.
> Dinobot glared at Sineses, no bot would get past him as long as he was
> alive!*
>
